column1: prompt

Rewrite the following paragraph in a more concise manner without changing its meaning. Design is an important part of the modern business world. The design of a product or service provides users with a clearly differentiated experience, which can provide an added value in many cases. It is key to optimize the user experience, making sure it meets the needs of the end-user, while also ensuring the product is aesthetically pleasing.
Write a few sentences about your own country in third person.

Read the sentences below and select a word to complete the following sentence: The museum curator was __________ about the valuable paintings.
a) ironic
b) suspicious
c) excited
d) cautious
Write a couple of sentences about the most recent book you've read.
Write down 3 adjectives that describe the following noun. cake
Name a famous painting or artwork.
What was the first dinosaur to be identified and recorded by scientists?

Analyze the given passage and classify its genre. It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness, it was the epoch of belief, it was the epoch of incredulity, it was the season of Light, it was the season of Darkness, it was the spring of hope, it was the winter of despair.

Oh, yeah

All the dreams we've had are lost

Value of x: 1
Value of y: 4
Equation 2: y + z = 10
Value of y: 4
Value of z: 6
